term.title: toxinology

item.text: Scientific discipline involving the study of the chemistry, biochemistry, pharmacology and toxicology of toxins.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2109 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
